channel.title: Adding Drops
channel.description:
i have just found out that my drops are in my npc handler, and i want it to drop more than rune plate legs, heres the code
[code] if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1007) { ItemHandler.addItem(6754, npcs[NPCID].absX,[/code]
how can i add more objects than that one?
